```{python}
import plotly.express as px
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from palmerpenguins import load_penguins

penguins = load_penguins()
# penguins.head()

fig = px.scatter(
    penguins,
    x="bill_length_mm",
    y="bill_depth_mm",
    color="species",
    size_max=20,  # 점 크기 최대값 설정
    # trendline = 'ols'
)

fig.show()
```
